Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Player>
          • battlespacekey.player.PlayerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Player>, java.util.Collection<Player>, java.util.List<Player>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class PlayerManager
extends java.util.ArrayList<Player>
    La classe PlayerManager permet la gestion d'une liste de Player

    /DM/
